snippet: The children of Chun Doo-hwan said on Tuesday that they would pay 167 billion won, or $154 million, that their father owed after being convicted of treason and taking bribes.
lead_paragraph: The children of Chun Doo-hwan said on Tuesday that they would pay 167 billion won, or $154 million, that their father owed after being convicted of treason and taking bribes.

headline.main: Family of Former South Korean Dictator to Pay His Fines
headline.print_headline: Family of Former South Korean Dictator to Pay His Fines

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
